content.detailedDescription: The first looked like a star but it was moving fast! it past a plane and continued speeding by then disappeared note there is no clouds out tonight! the second was a big ball of light flighing closer to the ground, it moved back and forth for a few seconds the went straight up and disappeared! this freaked me out
content.summary: I seen two.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to smoke a cigarette and was looking at the sky because i saw some strange things the past few nights.  i reported the airplane like thing last night... what was even more strange was after i reported it, i went back outside to smoke again and see if i could see anything else... when i was about to go outside i started feeling very nervous.. although i shouldn't have been.. not normal for me to be so nervous. i felt like someone was watching me. i went back inside cause i didn't like the feeling but i still even with my windows blinds closed and doors locked i felt very eery feeling.  then my dog started going nuts barking and growling and whining. he went and sat in front of the door and whined for about 20min. (note: my dog is deaf so couldn't have been from something he heard.) i then took him outside and he started sniffing around our front yard, whining and growling at the same time.. very unusual. we went back inside and he stayed by the door until my fiance got home and we went to bed.

after that experience i thought i would watch the stars again tonight while outside smoking, and i just happened to see what i thought again looked like the north star but brighter and on the opposite side of the sky (towards the west).  it had all the qualities of the north star but brighter and closer.  it was not moving.  i thought this was strange cause i haven't seen this bright of a star and there wasn't a star in that location last night.  then to the south i saw something that looked like a plane again without any blinking lights, moving across the sky, so i went inside to get my camera. i came back outside, with my 7 year old son, and tried to find the moving object again while recording on my camera.  i couldn't get my camera to focus on it (this is just a regular canon digital camera.. not anything high tech so not very good quality)  i did however get the camera to focus on the bright star like light to the east.  i am uploading the video... it shows at about 1 min 25 sec in to the recording.  this was about 10 minutes till 9pm indiana daylight savings time.  after a few minutes, i went back inside to put my son to bed.  10 minutes later after my son was in bed, i went back outside to look again but the light was gone!! i took a few seconds of video focused on the area where it had been. i am uploading this video as well.  


well.. having trouble uploading the videos so i will try to attach them later.
content.summary: Starlike bright white light - not moving, then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Dans le couloir d'approche marseille istre,point noir stationnaire sans lumiere sans bruit de turbine ��� gaz ou rotor d'helicoptere.
d���placement lent d'ouest en est, puis deplacement tres rapide sans aucun bruit supersonique.Ph���nom���ne en observation sans aucun doute et ��� la limite basse des nuages.
passsage de 2 canadairs qui ont fait demi tour sur marseille avec le ph���nomene dans leur 13h.
observation a dur��� minimun 2 ��� 3 heures.
content.summary: Black circle or point.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to work this morning.Just looked up and thought i was looking at a plane. it was moved in from left with a trail behind it.Again it just looked like a plane. but after a couple of minutes it just shot off at a right angle in the blink of an eye.I about ---- myself. i snaped this pics with my phone.
content.summary: I dont know what i saw but it was weird.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking my granddaughter for a walk in broad daylight near my home. there were scattered clouds in the sky, but it was mostly clear. i looked up and noticed an odd shaped object moving slowly from a westerly direction moving easterly. it was high in the sky and it was quite a long distance from my vantage point but i could tell immediately that it was not an aircraft (there were no wings or helicopter blades and there was no sound). my first thought was that it was some sort of balloon but it didn't resemble balloon shapes that i'm familiar with. after moving slowly eastward for a time, it stopped and hovered above my head for perhaps a minute or so. i always carry a small camera with me so i pulled it out and snapped a couple of photos zooming to the maximum that this camera is capable of (about 5x). i wasn't sure that the pictures would turn out since it was difficult to zero in on the image with the camera's viewfinder. after a minute or so the object drifted behind a small cloud. i watched for several minutes thinking that it would pass through the cloud and become visible again. after it vanished behind the cloud i never saw it again. my initial reaction was that this was an object that is not commonly seen, at least in my experience, and it definitely piqued my curiosity.

i was quite surprised to discover that the photos captured the object fairly well, especially the second photo. when zeroing in on the object with my computer's software i was very surprised to see that it was shaped like a dirigible or torpedo but it seems too small to be a blimp or similar type aircraft. it also appears to have a shiny metallic skin the reflects sunlight. the fact that it stopped and hovered for awhile also seems a bit strange since the cloud next to it was moving slowly with the prevailing wind. after viewing the photos on my computer i felt a sense of mystery and intrigue and am really anxious to see if there's some sort of conventional explanation for this sighting. i suppose it could be some sort of weather or scientific research balloon and i intend to do some follow-up to see whether or not that is a plausible explanation. i do find it especially strange that the object did not appear again after drifting behind the cloud.

any insights that you can provide would be appreciated. if you have any further questions feel free o contact me.  i look forward to hearing from you.
-[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Noticed odd shaped object moving slowly-at least 5,000 feet above my head.

content.detailedDescription: In agust i was sitting on my front porch talking with my niece.Since i see a lot of strange lights in the sky here i  am always looking up.I was watching the stars when poping out from behind the tree i was sitting next to came this dark object.At fist i thought my eyes wree playing tricks but when it went over my little pool the pool reflected off the bottom of this.As it moved slowly toward the woods the field next to my house reflcted off the bottom then the trees too.The onlly way i knew it was there was it blacked out the sky im sure if you viewed it from the top it would have rflected the sky.It was silent and just kinda glideing.You feel free to contact me if you like if there is no answer leave a mewssage.
content.summary: Dark silent object

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my front yard talking to my niece.We see so many strage lights here that im always looking up.I was looking up at the stars when this dark object first appeared from the fron part of the tree i was sitting next to.At first i  thought it was just an optical illision,you could not see through it.I first realized it was no illision when it slowly silently passed ofer out little pool and you could see the pool reflecting off the bottom.As i watched it pass by an open area between my yard and the woods it reflected every thig under it but blocked out the sky.My guess is if you viewed this from above it reflected the sky.It was a very neat way to camo somethig theo only way you could see that  there was an object there was because it blacked out the sky.It moved so slow but under inteligent control.Im sure it was no baloon before i deam anything unkown i rule out every possibilty.If i was not looking up at that exact moment i would not have witnessed it.All my niece could see was that the area i was pointing to was darker.I would be more than happy to talk to anyone about this just call if you get no answer just leave a message and i will return your call.
content.summary: Large unlighted object.

content.detailedDescription: I was able to speak to the witnesses again in person and obtained a drawing as well as being taken to the spot where the sighting occurred to take photographs, which i am including here. the drawing really helps to visualize the craft much better than the verbal description alone. with regards to the photo, please notice the road in the photo's right side; this is where the car was noticed to be pulled to the side of the road and caught the witnesses attention. opposite to this is the tree with the curved trunk in the photo's left side. just to the right of this tree and above the tree tops in the distance is where the orange craft was first spotted. the photo is taken from the witnesses' vantage at the time of the sighting. i hope this helps.
content.summary: Follow up info for previous filed sighting.

content.detailedDescription: I love sitting out on my balcony on a clear starry night and look into the sky and just take in the beauty. i like to see falling stars or meteorites and i really like it when sometimes i observe what looks like moving stars. on the evening of sept. 12th i was sitting on the balcony around 10:30pm and was doing my usual viewing of the sky. then about 11pm i couldn't believe what i saw and am not exactly sure how to describe it. i live in the city and even though there on some lights around the area i can still get a very large view of the stars in the eastern sky. so whatever this was showed up darker than the sky behind it. tumbling is the best word that i can use to describe it, the event was very fast. i didn't see it land anywhere, just disappeared after about 15 seconds. also noticed that it seemed to leave some sort of black trail behind it. my reactions was wow what did i just see. everything that i have ever seen has always been illuminated against the dark sky, never have i seen a dark object.
content.summary: Even though the sky was dark, i saw a darker rolling/falling object  very fast across part of the eastern sky.

content.detailedDescription: I had left from work at about 10:00pm and was beginning my hour long ride home on my scooter. shortly after leaving (around 10:10), i was driving west on marine drive nearing the 223rd st exit. as i approached the off-ramp, i noticed a unique light in the northern sky, and it was heading in my direction. what made the light unique was that it was circular in shape and moving back and forth across the front of the craft. it reminded me of the car "kit" from the television show 'knight rider' except for the fact the light was white and round. as it drew near (roughly 100 yards away), i could see the underneath of the craft. it seemed to have a triangular shape but rounded (basically there seemed to be no straight lines). the craft was also a silver color and absolutely had no visible means of propulsion. i didn't see any propellers or jet engines. now the most incredible part of this experience was that the light seemed to help determine the direction the craft would head. the light stopped pacing back and forth and was stuck on one end for about 20 seconds. the craft started heading in the direction the light was facing, and soon the craft stopped and tilted forward as if the lights were this crafts eyes. i immediately realized what i was witnessing was something out of the ordinary and caused me to lose control of my scooter for a brief moment. while this happened the crafts light shot directly in my direction and then the craft slowly turned in my direction. by then i was so scared i focused on my driving, trying to figure out what to do and where to go, being that i was in an area with little traffic and little to none lighting. about 30-45 seconds passed without looking at this craft,(while heading south on 223rd), but once i turned my head assuming it'd be above me by then, it was gone.  when i noticed the craft gone, i was coming to a light (possibly sandy blvd.) i will gladly provide further info if needed. thank you
content.summary: Ufo flew from north to south.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were on a cruise through the alaskan inside passage aboard the ms norwegian pearl.  it was approximately 9:30pm pdst.  the night sky was clear with no mist, fog or clouds anywhere in sight.  the seas were calm.  our position which i checked via gps after the incident and then factored in the time and distance traveled subsequently was about 51���02.23' n 128���38.26' w.

our stateroom was an outside cabin on the port side towards the bow of the ship.  we went out on the balcony to view the stars and the water.  no moon was visible and the staterooms to either side of us had no outer lights on so visibility was excellent.  according to the ship's gps broadcasts over the stateroom tv the ship was traveling at 22 knots with a compass bearing of about 338 degrees.

ahead of the ship and about 10 - 20 degrees off her port bow and above us i noticed a bright light heading in a straight line along the side of the ship at about 11 o'clock.  it was coming directly towards the ship but on a parallel, not an intercept course.  the light was brighter than any star, and brighter than venus on a clear night.  it was also more of a dingy, yellowish white rather than the white or bluish light of stars and planets.  there was no flicker to it nor was there any changing of color.

i directed my wife's attention to the object and noted that it was approaching the ship but only very slowly; far less than the speed at which an approaching aircraft would have been moving.  we both looked for any sign of flashing strobes or of the standard red/green lights lights on conventional aircraft but there were none.  if i had held a new pencil out at arms' length the eraser would have just been big enough to cover the object, but just barely so.

the object passed above and along the length of the ship and passed by our position over a period lasting about 5 minutes.  both my wife and i continued to look carefully for any signs of a strobe or navigation lights but there were none, not when it was in front of the ship, not when it was directly perpendicular to our position and not after it has passed us by.  we also listened closely for any sounds of engines.  there were none.  as the seas were very calm and any wind consisted mainly of that generated by our ship's own forward motion, noise levels were very low.  we would easily have been able to hear a plane or helicopter engine.  since there was no cloud cover at all we had no way to accurately determine the object's altitude.  i think it was probably no less than 1000 feet and probably no more than 3000, but that's a very subject estimation.  the object did not pass near enough to any bright stars for us to detect whether there was a greater bulk behind the bright light or not. 

after about 5 minutes the object simply faded from view over the course of less than 10 seconds.  one moment it was very bright, then next it was fading, fading, fading, gone.  as it faded out there was no deviation in any direction from its original course.  we looked carefully to see if there might have been some very nebulous, low-lying clouds it could have ducked behind, but we could still clearly see faint stars in the same area the object had disappeared in.  they were faint, but not obscured by clouds.  the object simply disappeared.

my wife and i stood discussing what we had just seen and kicking around all of the possibilities.  we were confident it had not been an aircraft in any conventional sense.  it was completely silent and had none of the normal running lights required.  we considered whether or not it could have been some sort of balloon.  the fact that we were approaching it at 22 knots and yet it took about 5 minutes to travel such a short distance to get past us suggested it may have been moving in the same direction our ship was traveling only at a slower speed.  still, we thought, if we had grossly misjudged its altitude, perhaps it was some type of balloon and the slowness of its approach had been due to its extreme height.

we chewed things over like this for about another 5 minutes when all of the sudden the object reappeared in its full brightness at about the same position relative to the ship it had vanished at.  this time it kept exact pace with the ship and fell no further behind.  it was, however, now moving on an intercept course perpendicular to the ship.  it took about 2 minutes to traverse a distance equal to the length of my thumb held out at arms' length at which point it made a course deviation back up to the north and then reversed course away from the ship before correcting once again in the opposite way so that it was again approaching.  both my wife and i noted this course change at the same time so it was not a trick of the eyes.  it was clear an unambiguous.

there was still no sound and still no other lights of any kind associated with it.  once again it began to fade from view only this time the fade was slower.  it took nearly a full minute for the object to fade to the brightness of a very dim star but it was clearly visible the whole time.  once it had reached this level of brightness it continued to move towards the ship for another 2 to 3 minutes, very slowly and visible at all times.  when it had traveled about twice the distance of my thumb again it disappeared entirely.

we waited for several more minutes on the balcony to see if it would reappear.  it did not.  however, it seemed to us highly unlikely that any type of balloon would have drifted at high altitude past the ship then held position and followed the ship while executing first a 90 degree turn so as to head towards the pearl, then a letter s type maneuver, then headed back towards the ship again while keeping pace with it.  so we ruled out the balloon hypothesis.  we couldn't come up with any other plausible explanations.  the ship never deviated from its course the whole time so were were not being fooled by apparent motion of the object.  there was no sound, no other lights, and no flickering or twinkling of the object's light.  we ruled out all the things we're sure it was not.  we just couldn't come to any firm conclusion as to what it actually was.
content.summary: Brilliant light intercepted then followed cruise ship norwegian pearl during voyage through alaska/canada inside passage.

content.detailedDescription:
We were standing on the balcony of our house in ketchikan, alaska. it's a clear night and my sister and i noticed an odd formation of multi-colored lights hovering over the southeast area of town. we noticed it at least 45 minutes ago and we've been observing it for about 45 minutes with binoculars.

it's hard to determine the exact shape but it appears to be somewhat spherical, not making any apparent forward or backward progress, and it's maintaining a fairly steady altitude.

we haven't seen anything like this before. sometimes it appears steady then it zigzags erractically. the colors range from red, blue, yellow, white, purple, green.

we haven't lost sight of the object. it appears to be a little bit smaller right now but it's still there and visible with the naked eye.

has anyone else reported this?  does anyone have any idea what it might be? we come from a family of pilots and this is defintetly odd.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multi-colored light/s hovering over/above the (roughly) southeast area of town; hasn't made much progress; altitude roughly maintained; erratic movement/zigzagging apparent.

content.detailedDescription: Second sighting of same/similar object within two months. multi-colored lights flashing vertically. stationary app 40 min. attempted to photograph. after two flashes of camera, object quickly moved directly over tree line. hovered app 20 secs & disappeared below tree line for several seconds, then reappeared, hovered above trees, disappeared. followed by unusual amount of "high" flying air traffic and one low flying airplane. neighbor had been watching the object for app 20 mins prior to this activity.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Appeared to be vertical/cylindrical in shape

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my recliner talking to my neighbor and a light caught my eye. i turned my head to the left to look out the window(that faces east) and saw a bright star-like object. it looked like the one i saw 9/3. i asked my neighbor to look at it because i didn't have my camera.  she lives on the street perpendicular to my home. together we watched the light about 45 degrees in the sky, staying in the same location about 10 minutes.  i asked her to tell me what she saw and she said," there is a bright white star with a red rotating light." i couldn't see the red light from my position except for a second.  after about ten minutes we saw it move to about 55 degrees in the sky and gradually further away.
after about 20 minutes i saw the star like light spread to a small white line and disappear.

i learned on the news after observing the object that there was a grainery fire in east toledo.
content.summary: While talking on phone to a neighbor, i looked out the window facing east and saw the bright white star shaped light.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to close my car windows and noticed a light in the sky changing in brightness. i went and got some binoculars and saw a bright light with 3 dimmer lights on both sides of it. it changed brightness when the craft rotated  about 45 degrees. then rotated back. i've been watching it for an hour now and it's still there at 11:45. i live on long island ny and it's to my south west at about 45 degrees up. i wish i had a telescope to see it better.
content.summary: Looked in the sw and saw a light changing in brightness & got binoculars to see a bright light with several dimmer lights on either side.

content.detailedDescription: On sunday (9/12) at around 8:20pm i was out looking at the sky and enjoying the clear skies. the sun had set but there was still considerable light left and few stars were visible that i saw. looking northwest at about 35 degrees above the horizon i noticed a bright white circular light approaching from the west. the objects speed was consistent with the aircraft that i normaly see in the area so i assumed that it was the forward landing lights that i was viewing directly head on that made it seem so bright. as the object passed and proceeded away from my location the light never lost size or intensity. i did view the object wth my binoculars on it's approach, passing and leaving. doing this always reveals some part of the aircraft or any marking lights (red, green or flashing) but this time it did not and the light actually seemed to have a dark center but i am not 100% sure of that. i viewed the object for approx 1 minute until it was obstructed by trees. i only chose to report this based on the report of the same event date from indiana which sounds really similar but i don't know if the time frames work for this to be the same object.
content.summary: Extremely bright white light moving from west to east britghter and larger than local aircraft and sattelites no flashing or colored lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I just got home from work and got my dog and started down my driveway for a walk. i looked up and saw this very bright light (white) going by overhead, altitude about 3000 - 5000 feet or less, object was taller than wide with no wings, it made no noise and had no strobe lights like a plane would have.  i just stopped and watched this object going from west to ese in the sky at a steady speed not very fast and not too slow. my wife came out on the porch and i told her to come look at this ufo. she laughed at first then she came down and we watched it go ese then  it sped up very fast and disappeared. the whole experience lasted less than 4 minutes.
i am an avid photographer and go to many airshows. this was not an aircrat it made no noise, had no strobes and took off at a rate of speed i never witnessed. my house is in the country i see many satellites and planes go over heard at night and this was no plane.
note the planet jupiter was just rising so it was not jupiter.
content.summary: Very bright light with no noise or strobes flew overhead and took off at a high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription: Well i went outside it was 10:26pm i went to bring my dog outside and when i looked up because i saw something bright in the side of my eye it was this strange light i have seen before but its been awhile ever sense i saw this light, it was bright round no sound at all and it stretched out like a star but it wasnt im sure it wasnt. i found this weird because it was raining like crazy today non stop from like 5:30pm to 8:30pm and when this was goin on an airplane went by this object i wonder if it saw it, i hope so. i tis time didnt get nervous i was anxious because last time i saw this it wasnt just one object i saw three floating in place and it just stayed there like for me to look at it, but tonight it did same i wanted to see more than just floating in place so i stood there lookin at it an it moved and stretched like a star after i got tired of looking at it i left inside the lasttime i saw this it was like this same time very weird
content.summary: It was bright it was floating in the sky and it looked like a star but it was just floating around no sound and it was round.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i was sitting on our back deck enjoying the sights and sounds of nature. we first noticed a very bright circle in the eastern sky.  when we first saw it i thought it was a planet and my husband thought it was an airplane.  during our discussion we decided it wasn't an airplane because it was't blinking and it couldn't be a planet because it was slowly and consistently moving. as we were watching and discussing it, it simply disappeared in front of our eyes.  it was rather startling.  at that point my husband shared with me this was't the first time he had witnessed strange things in the sky.  he will often times during the summer take a late night swim and lay on a lounger and watch the sky to relax and get ready for bed.  i have never personally seen anything like this before.  both my husband and i are wondering if it could be a ufo?
content.summary: Saw round bright light.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were just pulling in to his apartment building. as we stepped out of his car, i happened to glance upwards and see a very bright, white, and unblinking object slowly moving north across the sky. it was a fairly cloudy night and this coupled with light pollution from the town meant that few stars were visible. 

i pointed it out to my friend, who looked up and confirmed the object. neither of us knew what it was but immediately agreed that it was not a plane, as it was not the well-known red and white blinking pattern of an aircraft but rather one single unblinking white light. again i must stress how bright it was - by far the brightest light in the sky save the moon. 

another thought that occured to me at the time was some sort of meteorite. there is a well known meteor shower visible throughout the midwest in early august, and i had seen a few shooting stars over the past couple of days. this object was unlike any meteorite i had ever seen. 

it moved slowly and remained visible for just under a minute before suddenly stopping and disappearing. my friend and i looked at each other, perplexed. i can't be sure, but my first thought upon seeing the object disappear was that it underwent some sort of rapid ascent, but i can't really substantiate this, and my friend said at the time that it simply vanished. neither of us had seen anything like this before. 

we went inside and told our other friends who were, by and large, skeptical. they know my deep interest in ufo's and thought i was seeing things. my friend, however, has no such fascination and nonetheless had no explanation for what we saw. it was a bona fide unidentified flying object.
content.summary: A very bright, white oval seen overhead travelling north. visible for less than a minute before abruptly disappearing.

content.detailedDescription:
Last week or so i wrote about a star-like object dancing and chaging colors and eventually moving west.... it's back. it's relatively in the same spot and i have been watching for it every night. this is the first time it has been back. only one night was not clear, so i'm certain it was not there between the first sighting and now. 

just wanted to document this. it definately is moveing around - left, right, up, down... not plane or helicopter like at all.
content.summary: It's back! that star-like object dancing and changing colors.

content.detailedDescription:
Date;  12/09/2010
time;  2205 hrs.
                                                   ufo sighting
duration;  40 min.
place;  canton, ga.

details;   i went outside to the back deck to put out the tiki lights, when i looked towards the west,  i noticed a strange pulsating light in the western sky  about  12 miles away.  i could just make out some color flickering about the white light.  i waited a few minutes and it didn���t seem to move, i then noticed a  high flyer ( commercial jet) between my view and the object, the jet was a little higher.   i proceeded to go in the house to retrieve my binoculars and told my wife and daughter what i was seeing.  they went to get the cameras, and began to take pictures to document what we were looking at.   there was a bright white light with color lights(red, blue, green, orange) flickering all around it, as well as a smaller red orb a little smaller then the white light, it was positioned about 5���oclock  from the main light and moved clock wise to counter clock wise this was done several times then it blinked out.  the object at arms length would be about 3 mm in diameter. 
distance about 12 miles,  angle 35* degrees,  alt. 15+k,   compass dir. 255* w.  my daughter took some video, there are several jets flying by this stationary object, the video is from a small digital camera.  several more jets flew past this object, above, below and between us and the object.  if i was to guess the size, i would say the same as a 737.   we continued to watch for about 40 minutes then it seemed to move down over the tree line.  we are hoping for a repeat tonight, we will be ready.
the attach photo is a day time picture of the night time obsivation position.

I was outside smoking a cigarette and looking at the stars and clouds when i saw a bright light that i thought was the north star at first but then it was moving.  it was moving pretty quickly from west to east, thought it was an airplane at first but then i did see an airplane and realized it did not look the same.  it had no flashing lights, just one solid bright white light.  it moved faster than a plane at that height and made no sound.  it moved from west to east then suddenly turned south and then turned again and dissappeared out of sight, not behind a cloud or anything, just slowly faded.  i just don't think it was an airplane because there were no flashing lights and it turned way too sharply too fast, like a 90degree turn very quickly for that altitude. wondering if anyone else saw this?
content.summary: Airplane like but not an airplane.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my brother were outside talking, i looked around and noticed a brite red sphere with a white light in the front of the red sphere the red sphere was huge, and brite as a tower making light steady brite red no flashing at all the white light was dimming from brite white to a dimming white. the object was steady moving across the sky it was maybe a half a mile away about 200 to 300 feet above the ground it stopped dead steady in the sky for about 15 seconds then changed direction and did not go up or down it moved away in a straight line and it faded away into the sky.
content.summary: Brite red sphere with white light.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the way to work and saw green flash then a green streak of light head towards the ground. it had a tail like a shooting star ar it could have been burning green behind it. the whole thing happened pretty fast. i saw three other cars stop and look. they looked as confused as me. i have never seen anything like this before. i know airplanes arent green with tails. i dont know if it was a meteor or not, never seen one. i would love to know what it was though.
content.summary: Saw green object streak towards ground. could have been meteor. never seen ufo or meteor.

content.detailedDescription: 5 of my friends and i were sitting on our back patio after 2 in the morning.  after an exclamation from one of my friends, i turned my head (i was already looking up at the stars) and caught sight of a small dim light traveling very fast in the sky.  at first thought, i considered it to be a bird soring around.  it continued until it was hidden behind high cirrus clouds.  coming from behind the clouds, it continued to go in a straight line.  at this point i was highly confused.  if it was a plane, it was traveling faster than any plane i've seen at that hight.  at that speed, it would have made some sort of sound being at such a low level (but it was higher than that).  finally, i lost sight of it, both from getting too far away and blending into the light pollution over raleigh.
content.summary: High flying, fast moving, dim light.

content.detailedDescription:
Playa del rey, ca
lights came down from the sky and go into the wetlands area on a blustery day.
my boyfriend "decided" to go out and video tape the wind blowing the trees for only about 15 minutes. we finally watched the footage over a year later and found these lights.
on youtube:[link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Lights come down from the sky and go into wetlands.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside with dog having a cigar when i heard what sounded like a native american chant echoing from a darkened field.  this object came over the trees at about the altitude of an airplane fromt he direction of the chanting.  the object was a bright, yet dulled pale yellow.  it was about the size of jupiter and venus joined together on their brightest luminescence. it flew from the west to the southeast.  after the object went over the far horizon the chanting ceased within minutes.  i don't know if the two are related but they seemed to coincide with each other and each seemed to stop with each other.  i tried to check the field where i heard the chanting from and it was dark and empty.  i also got the sense of presence from the object and along with the chanting seemed to cast a strong presence of unease.
content.summary: Bright luminescent object, pale yellow and circular.

content.detailedDescription: At the time my parents were avid ufo hunters they had many experiences and had ordered ufo detector plans from project starlight(still have the plans)on the night in question the detector had gone off and my parents and two brothers had went outside and in the northeastern sky had seen an odd light so we had big high powered flash lights and started flashing them at the light and it stopped moving and soon a light came out from underneath and started coming toward us so we kept flashing(very excited)so it came closer and closer came to the edge of our yard(in the woods)we were about 75 to 100feet away it was disk shaped with a band of colored spinning lights like a belt with portals with figures in them totally silent except windy me my middle brother and mother all ran inside and hid under the beds and my older brother and father stayed and watched longer and the disk went over my yard and father and brother and kept going about 300 feet over to the edge of the cometary and turned around went back over them and returned to its other ship and casually left then after my father and brother came back inside me and my middle brother went back outside to see if we could still see the ship and it was gone and at that time three army jets in a triangular formation from the direction of fort devens flue over the house and us at tree top level so we know they had the object on radar so thats my story i would take a lie detector test any day of the week i know what i saw and it was about 75 to 100 feet around and about the same distance from us and there is no way it was anything but advanced very advanced from another world so far ahead of us we cant comprehend.And around the same time my parents were smoking in bed and dont remember anything but waking up with both having a very weird dream of being picked up and being examined by beings and them teling my mom that she would die from cancer and here it is 25 years later and she passed earlier this year from pancreatic cancer very weird and father can still tell you of the dreams he is kinda sick know and my middle brother is passed but my older brother and father would probably tell you of the incident but its bothered me my whole life and i just wanted someone to know other than us that i thought could understand             thank you *(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms)call anytime id love to talk farther and i also have a signed leter from betty and barny hill to my mom from the day and the detector plans ill tell you one thing that stopped our curiosity
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: So close i know it was extraterrestial bothered me my whole life.

content.detailedDescription: Three of us were returning from a high school football game in a suv traveling north on 17th street on the east side of bend oregon.  it was  10 pm when we noticed lights to the north, off in the distance, perhaps several miles away  it was a clear night and no moon light.   as we discussed the incident later, all of us at first just assumed it was an aircraft at first.  however the object then went from what seemed like a stationary point several miles off and at a high rate of speed, perhaps 1500 mph, as though it was shot from a gun, it came directly towards us and stopped a short ways off, maybe 1000 feet away.  it stopped instantly; there did not appear to be any acceleration or deceleration -it just went full speed and stopped on a dime.  then the object in a similar manner shot off in easterly direction and stopped again then it came back again and hovered perhaps 500 feet away and not more than 500 in elevation.  then the object moved very slowly getting closer to us.  we could see very clearly the object was triangular in shape perhaps the same mass as a medium sized motor home, not really very large.  underneath the object were perhaps 15 symmetrically placed bright white lights that formed the shape of a triangle with lights inside the triangular shape as well.  i would estimate the diameter of the lights at 5��� and they were definitely round in shape, the bottom side protruded down sort of like spot light in shape.  all the lights were on and extremely bright, not flashing or pulsing or fading.  the object was approximately 1/3 longer than the width of what appeared to be the rear of the object.  on the sides were red lights that appeared to at times be on wings or perhaps the upper sides of the craft.  one of the witnesses with me said he saw blue lights, which i did not see.  when the craft was slowly hovering a short distance away it seemed that part of the craft, the part illuminated with the red lights, rotated or shifted some how in a very bizarre manner, as though they messed, passed through each other and traded sides on the craft which gave the impression it was flip flopping around, although the triangular shaped lights on the bottom remained constant and did not change or fluctuate in their positions.  these events all unfolded in about 90 seconds, then again the craft shot off, like shot from a gun.  it went from a hovering position to full speed instantaneously which was at a very high rate of speed in a westerly direct and in just an instant out of sight.   all of these maneuvers did not generate any noise, the craft was absolutely quiet and did not stir up any dust  on the ground.  we did not see it again, it was gone.  all of us were shocked and nervously laughed about what we just seen.  not one of had ever seen anything like it before.  we started to try to explain what we saw.  we eliminated helicopters because it would have been noisy and would stirred up a bunch of dust.  a helicopter could never perform those types of maneuvers, we eliminated airplanes for similar reasons.  the only conclusion we could draw was that the object was a ufo.  perhaps this was a once in a life time event for the three  of us, but we all agree, we hope to see it again. it was very interesting and facinating. in retrospect not one of us was fearful or frightened, only curious.  i  spent a good portion of the next evening looking into the night sky hoping to see it again.  we all agreed we would never look up to the night sky in the same way after seeing our first ufo.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright trianglular shaped object sighted on far east side of bend, oregon.
